duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care and support to oncology patients, including administering treatments and medications.
Assess and monitor oncology patients to ensure their physical and emotional well-being.
Collaborate with healthcare team members to develop and implement individualized care plans for patients.
Educate patients and their families about their conditions, treatment options, and self-care measures.
Maintain accurate medical records and documentation related to patient care.
Participate in interdisciplinary meetings to discuss patient progress and treatment plans.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Nursing (Master's Degree preferred)
